1. Getting started doesn’t go into plugins
  2. First item under references is Player API — general API is advanced
  3. need reorganization of content so that it isn’t 2 getting started docs and then a sea of 40 other pages
  4. Maybe reorganize topically? possible topics:
    • analytics
    • advertising
    • change player appearance
    • creating interactivity
  6. Maybe learning paths by topic?
  7. Docs on modifications to embed code
